reviews.author: Norvin Viergutz

reviews.title: Egg Timers Gone Wild
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful app that uses the egg timer concept not for the bland, traditional egg-cooking purposes; it is used as a timer for multiple activities at once. With its great customization, beautiful interface, and continued support, it is a great tool to keep me on top of my writing, gaming, and napping.
reviews.author: Christopher Kunkel
